verses.verse: I <S%G1473><s%> charge <S%G1263><s%> thee therefore <S%G3767><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who shall <S%G3195><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> the quick <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%> at <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G848><s%> appearing <S%G2015><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> kingdom; <S%G932><s%>

Preach <S%G2784><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> word; <S%G3056><s%> be instant <S%G2186><s%> in season, <S%G2122><s%> out of season; <S%G171><s%> reprove, <S%G1651><s%> rebuke, <S%G2008><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> longsuffering <S%G3115><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> doctrine. <S%G1322><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> will come <S%G2071><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they will not <S%G3756><s%> endure <S%G430><s%> sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine; <S%G1319><s%> but <S%G235><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> shall they heap <S%G2002><s%> to themselves <S%G1438><s%> teachers, <S%G1320><s%> having itching <S%G2833><s%> ears; <S%G189><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall turn away <S%G654><s%> their ears <S%G189><s%> from <S%G575><s%> <S%G3303><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth, <S%G225><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> shall be turned <S%G1624><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> fables. <S%G3454><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> watch <S%G3525><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things, <S%G3956><s%> endure afflictions, <S%G2553><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> of an evangelist, <S%G2099><s%> make full proof <S%G4135><s%> of thy <S%G4675><s%> ministry. <S%G1248><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am now ready to be offered, <S%G4689><s%> <S%G2235><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> of my <S%G1699><s%> departure <S%G359><s%> is at hand. <S%G2186><s%>
I have fought <S%G75><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> fight, <S%G73><s%> I have finished <S%G5055><s%> my course, <S%G1408><s%> I have kept <S%G5083><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> faith: <S%G4102><s%>

Henceforth <S%G3063><s%> there is laid up <S%G606><s%> for me <S%G3427><s%> a crown <S%G4735><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> judge, <S%G2923><s%> shall give <S%G591><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day: <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to me <S%G1698><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but <S%G235><s%> unto all <S%G3956><s%> them also that love <S%G25><s%> <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> appearing. <S%G2015><s%>
Do thy diligence <S%G4704><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> shortly <S%G5030><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me: <S%G3165><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> Demas <S%G1214><s%> hath forsaken <S%G1459><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> having loved <S%G25><s%> this present <S%G3568><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> is departed <S%G4198><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Thessalonica; <S%G2332><s%> Crescens <S%G2913><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Galatia, <S%G1053><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Dalmatia. <S%G1149><s%>

Only <S%G3441><s%> Luke <S%G3065><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%> Take <S%G353><s%> Mark, <S%G3138><s%> and bring <S%G71><s%> him with <S%G3326><s%> thee: <S%G4572><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> profitable <S%G2173><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the ministry. <S%G1248><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> Tychicus <S%G5190><s%> have I sent <S%G649><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Ephesus. <S%G2181><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> cloak <S%G5341><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I left <S%G620><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> Carpus, <S%G2591><s%> when thou comest, <S%G2064><s%> bring <S%G5342><s%> with thee, and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> books, <S%G975><s%> but especially <S%G3122><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> parchments. <S%G3200><s%>

Alexander <S%G223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> coppersmith <S%G5471><s%> did <S%G1731><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> evil: <S%G2556><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> reward <S%G591><s%> him <S%G846><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> works: <S%G2041><s%>
Of whom <S%G3739><s%> be thou ware <S%G5442><s%> <S%G4771><s%> also; <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he hath greatly <S%G3029><s%> withstood <S%G436><s%> our <S%G2251><s%> words. <S%G3056><s%>

At <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> answer <S%G627><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> stood with <S%G4836><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> but <S%G235><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men forsook <S%G1459><s%> me: <S%G3165><s%> I pray God that it may not <S%G3361><s%> be laid to their charge. <S%G3049><s%> <S%G846><s%>

Notwithstanding <S%G1161><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> stood with <S%G3936><s%> me, <S%G3427><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> strengthened <S%G1743><s%> me; <S%G3165><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> preaching <S%G2782><s%> might be fully known, <S%G4135><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> might hear: <S%G191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I was delivered <S%G4506><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the lion. <S%G3023><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> shall deliver <S%G4506><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> from <S%G575><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will preserve <S%G4982><s%> me unto <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G848><s%> heavenly <S%G2032><s%> kingdom: <S%G932><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> forever and ever. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> Prisca <S%G4251><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Aquila, <S%G207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> household <S%G3624><s%> of Onesiphorus. <S%G3683><s%>

Erastus <S%G2037><s%> abode <S%G3306><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Corinth: <S%G2882><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> Trophimus <S%G5161><s%> have I left <S%G620><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Miletum <S%G3399><s%> sick. <S%G770><s%>

Do thy diligence <S%G4704><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> winter. <S%G5494><s%> Eubulus <S%G2103><s%> greeteth <S%G782><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Pudens, <S%G4227><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Linus, <S%G3044><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Claudia, <S%G2803><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> brethren. <S%G80><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> spirit. <S%G4151><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
